00017 typedef Uint32 UnicodeChar;
00018 typedef std::basic_string<UnicodeChar> UnicodeString;
00019 typedef Uint16 Utf16Char;
00020 typedef std::basic_string<Utf16Char> Utf16String;
00021 
00022 struct ConversionItem {
00023  UnicodeChar Unicode;
00024  unsigned char Utf8[4];
00025  char Ascii;
00026 };
00027 
00028 #define UNKNOWN_CHARACTER ' '  // Characters not in conversion table
00029 extern ConversionItem tConversionTable[];

00031 
00032 ///////////////////////
00033 // Moves the iterator to next unicode character in the string, returns number of bytes skipped
00034 template<typename _Iterator1, typename _Iterator2>
00035 inline size_t IncUtf8StringIterator(_Iterator1& it, const _Iterator2& last) {
00036  if(it == last) return 0;
00037  unsigned char c;
00038  size_t res = 1;
00039  for(++it; last != it; ++it, ++res) {
00040   c = *it;
00041   if(!(c&0x80) || ((c&0xC0) == 0xC0)) break;
00042  }
00043 
00044  return res;
00045 }
00046 
00047 template<typename _Iterator>
00048 inline size_t MultIncUtf8StringIterator(_Iterator& it, const _Iterator& last, size_t count) {
00049  size_t res = 0;
00050  for(size_t i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00051   if(it == last) break;
00052   res += IncUtf8StringIterator(it, last);
00053  }
00054 
00055  return res;
00056 }
00057 
00058 ///////////////////
00059 // The iterator points at first byte of the UTF8 encoded character, returns number of bytes skipped
00060 template<typename _Iterator1, typename _Iterator2>
00061 inline size_t DecUtf8StringIterator(_Iterator1& it, const _Iterator2& first) {
00062  if(it == first) return 0;
00063  size_t res = 1;
00064  unsigned char c;
00065  --it;
00066  for(; first != it; --it, ++res) {
00067   c = *it;
00068   if(!(c&0x80) || ((c&0xC0) == 0xC0)) break;
00069  }
00070 
00071  return res;
00072 }
00073 
00074 template<typename _Iterator>
00075 inline _Iterator GetMultIncUtf8StringIterator(_Iterator it, const _Iterator& last, size_t count) {
00076  MultIncUtf8StringIterator(it, last, count);
00077  return it;
00078 }
00079 
00080 inline std::string::const_iterator Utf8PositionToIterator(const std::string& str, size_t pos) {
00081  std::string::const_iterator res = str.begin();
00082  MultIncUtf8StringIterator(res, str.end(), pos);
00083  return res;
00084 }
00085 
00086 inline std::string::iterator Utf8PositionToIterator(std::string& str, size_t pos) {
00087  std::string::iterator res = str.begin();
00088  MultIncUtf8StringIterator(res, str.end(), pos);
00089  return res;
00090 }

00094 ////////////////////////
00095 // Reads next unicode character from a UTF8 encoded string
00096 // the iterator shows at the next character after this operation
00097 UnicodeChar GetNextUnicodeFromUtf8(std::string::const_iterator &it, const std::string::const_iterator& last, size_t& num_skipped);
00098 inline UnicodeChar GetNextUnicodeFromUtf8(std::string::const_iterator& it, const std::string::const_iterator& last)  {
00099  size_t tmp; return GetNextUnicodeFromUtf8(it, last, tmp); }
00100 
00101 inline UnicodeChar GetUnicodeFromUtf8(const std::string& str, size_t pos) {
00102  std::string::const_iterator it = Utf8PositionToIterator(str, pos);
00103  return GetNextUnicodeFromUtf8(it, str.end());
00104 }

00106 ////////////////////
00107 // Gets the UTF8 representation of the unicode character (can be more bytes)
00108 std::string GetUtf8FromUnicode(UnicodeChar ch);

00112 inline size_t Utf8StringSize(const std::string& str)  {
00113  size_t res = 0;
00114  std::string::const_iterator it = str.begin();
00115  for(; it != str.end(); IncUtf8StringIterator(it, str.end()))
00116   res++;
00117 
00118  return res;
00119 }
00120 
00121 inline std::string Utf8SubStr(const std::string& str, size_t start, size_t n = (size_t)-1) {
00122  if (n == (size_t)-1)
00123   return std::string(Utf8PositionToIterator(str, start), str.end());
00124  else
00125   return std::string(
00126          Utf8PositionToIterator(str, start),
00127          Utf8PositionToIterator(str, start + n));
00128 }
00129 
00130 inline void Utf8Erase(std::string& str, size_t start, size_t n = (size_t)-1) {
00131  std::string::iterator it = Utf8PositionToIterator(str, start);
00132  str.erase(it, GetMultIncUtf8StringIterator(it, str.end(), n));
00133 }
00134 
00135 inline void Utf8Insert(std::string& str, size_t start, const std::string& s) {
00136  str.insert(Utf8PositionToIterator(str, start), s.begin(), s.end());
00137 }
00138 
00139 inline void InsertUnicodeChar(std::string& str, size_t pos, UnicodeChar ch) {
00140  std::string tmp = GetUtf8FromUnicode(ch);
00141  Utf8Insert(str, pos, tmp);
00142 }

00165 size_t TransformRawToUtf8Pos(const std::string& text, size_t pos);
00166 size_t TransformUtf8PosToRaw(const std::string& text, size_t pos);
00167 inline size_t TransformRawToUtf8ToRaw(const std::string& src, size_t srcpos, const std::string& dest) {
00168  return TransformUtf8PosToRaw(dest, TransformRawToUtf8Pos(src, srcpos));
